properties.Name: CreditCriteria
properties.Description:
Criteria upon which a Customer may be scored to determine their overall worthiness to have credit extended to them.

Ex:
INDIVIDUAL
- Income to debt ratio
- Outstanding fixed debts
- Credit card debt
- Spousal debt
- Suits
- Bankruptcy

LEGAL ENTITY
Ex:
- Profitability
- Solvency Short Term
- Efficiency
- Debt Utilization
- Receivables
- Legal Entity Ability To Pay
- Ability To Collect Receivables

Columns.Name: CreditCriteriaId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Credit Criteria.

Columns.Name: CreditCriteriaName
Columns.Description: The name of a Credit Criteria.

Columns.Name: CreditCriteriaDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Credit Criteria.
